responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Missing CSRF protection when a user signs in
    analysis: |
      The code does not seem to implement any CSRF protection. An attacker may trick
      a user into clicking a malicious link to `/` which will execute a sign-in request
      on the attacker's behalf, if the user is already logged in to Spotify.
    cwe: CWE-352
    function_names:
      - index
    filenames:
      - examples/app.py
    classification: slightly promising
```

leads.headline: Missing CSRF protection when a user signs in
leads.analysis:
The code does not seem to implement any CSRF protection. An attacker may trick
a user into clicking a malicious link to / which will execute a sign-in request
on the attacker's behalf, if the user is already logged in to Spotify.
